Headline: #95 95th,  #115 Pullman/115th Temporary  Westbound Reroute near 95th/St Lawrence
ShortDescription: WB 95 95th, 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Cottage Grove, 100th, King Drive and 95th: due to, street blockage near 95th St Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound  #95 95th, #115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Cottage Grove, 100th, King Drive and 95th including the normal route streets at the beginning and end due to street blockage near 95th/St. Lawrence.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #53A Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/81st
ShortDescription: 53A buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 79th, Lawndale, 83rd, then resume their normal route on Pulaski due to street blockage near Pulaski/81st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#53A buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 79th, Lawndale, 83rd, then resume their normal route on Pulaski due to street blockage near Pulaski/81st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump and #15 Jeffery Local Temporary Reroute at Jeffrey/67th
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Jump & 15 Jeffery Local buses are rrtd via  67th, South Shore, 75th, & Jeffrey, then resume their normal route due to blockage nr Jeffrey/67th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#J14 Jeffery Jump and #15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via  67th, South Shore, 75th, and Jeffrey, then resume their normal route due to street blockage near Jeffrey/67th.
